{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-17T13:44:14.000Z", "description": "

Force-X is seeking a Software Engineer for our client in Suwanee, GA. This is a full-time, Direct Hire position.


QUALIFICATIONS:

  • Requires at least 1 year relevant experience.
  • Must be a US person (US citizen or Green Card)
  • Adaptable, Flexible, Ability to Learn \u2013 must be able to work with different architecture and software
  • Experience with creative problem-solving \u2013 must be able to overcome obstacles with a unique perspective to benefit the team
  • Team Player \u2013 must be able to accept a role in a team and work well together, sharing goals, effort, and not afraid to ask for assistance
  • Experience with C++ and C# programming.
  • Experience with 3D software development (Gaming, Simulation, or Commercial) \u2013 experience in using modern 3D development software and understanding of engine-related optimization, limitation, and strengths.
  • Experience with object-oriented and component-oriented programming.
  • Experience with database management \u2013 interfacing with a database to external software for handling large amounts of save/load, and data management
  • Experience of programing with 3rd party SDK and API \u2013 utilizing 3rd party hardware and software
  • Experience with Unity \u2013 as well as packages, C#, and prefab management


EDUCATION: 

  • Engineering degree in computer science or relevant field
